  • Methodendetails

    • isEnabled

      public static boolean isEnabled(org.slf4j.Logger logger, org.slf4j.event.Level level)
      Check if logging level is enabled for logger.
      Parameter:
      logger - logger
      level - level to check
      Gibt zurück:
      true if level is enabled, false otherwise

    • log

      public static void log(org.slf4j.Logger logger, org.slf4j.event.Level level, String text)
      Log text message using given logging level.
      Parameter:
      logger - logger
      level - logging level
      text - text message to log

    • forAnalyticLogging

      public static String forAnalyticLogging(Object value)
      Convert object value to string containing also type of value for analytic logging.

      null: null, char: 'v', String: "v", Date/Time/Calendar types: type@formatted_value, others: type@v.toString()

      Method should only be used for trace and error logging because there is no mechanism to hide security critical values!

      Parameter:
      value - value to log
      Gibt zurück:
      string representation containing value's type

    • forAnalyticLogging

      public static String forAnalyticLogging(Collection<Object> values)
      Convert collection of values to string for analytic logging.

      See forAnalyticLogging(Object).

      Method should only be used for trace and error logging because there is no mechanism to hide security critical values!

      Parameter:
      values - values to log
      Gibt zurück:
      string in '[' and ']' containing comma separated string representations of given values

    • greyOut

      public static String greyOut(String secretInfo)
      Grey out secret info.
      Parameter:
      secretInfo - secret info to replace by '*'
      Gibt zurück:
      '***' of length of secret info with max length 32

    • isSecret

      public static boolean isSecret(String name)
      Check if a name forces secret logging of value.

      Secret logging of value is forced for names containing '_secret', 'pwd' and 'passwor'.

      Parameter:
      name - name to check
      Gibt zurück:
      true if secret logging is forced, false otherwise

    • forSecretLogging

      public static String forSecretLogging(String expr, Object value)
      Build string for logging of value or '***' if expression given contains 'secret_' or 'passwor' or 'pwd'.
      Parameter:
      expr - expression (may be name of value to log)
      value - value to log
      Gibt zurück:
      string representation for logging of '***' for secret value

    • tabs

      public static String tabs(int count)
      Returns indentation string of count tabs.
      Parameter:
      count - number of tabs for indentation
      Gibt zurück:
      indentation string
